cmp: 声 (sound/voice/(a measure word, used for sounds)/tone/noise)
几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: to use up, to exhaust, empty

exm.mng: to use up, to exhaust, empty
to be completely sold out, to sell out
to run out, to have exhausted
so many that the bamboo slats have been exhausted, innumerable crimes (idiom), see also 罄筆難書|罄笔难书[qing4 bi3 nan2 shu1]
too numerous to be cited (of atrocities or misdeeds) (idiom), see also 罄竹難書|罄竹难书[qing4 zhu2 nan2 shu1]
erhua variant of 罄身[qing4 shen1]
